thread.title: Westfield Shopping Mall - Brandon

title: Westfield Shopping Mall - Brandon
text:
Expert Videos 
Overview: 
One of the Tampa Bay area's largest shopping malls is conveniently located just off I-75. Its great stores and many family-friendly amenities make it a popular destination where shoppers can choose from over 250 shops and restaurants. 
Shopping: 
Westfield Shopping Mall offers a wide selection of shops, including many featuring fashions and accessories for men, women and children, fine jewelry, health and beauty, as well as essentials for the home and entertaining. Its anchor stores include:
